reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 192/98: APPORTIONMENT OF MONEY COLLECTED BY OR PAID TO COLLECTORS
reg_info.reg_name_text: APPORTIONMENT OF MONEY COLLECTED BY OR PAID TO COLLECTORS
reg_info.act_under: Employment Standards Act   Loi sur les normes d’emploi

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsections 73.0.2 (7) and 73.0.3 (4) of the Act, if the money collected or paid is less than the total owing to all persons including the Director and the collector, the money shall be apportioned among those persons in proportion to the amount each is owed. O. Reg. 192/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of subsections 73.0.2 (7) and 73.0.3 (4) of the Act, if the money collected or paid is less than the total owing to all persons including the Director and the collector, the money shall be apportioned among those persons in proportion to the amount each is owed. O. Reg. 192/98, s. 1.
